channel.title: [PI] Spawning items on the ground
channel.description: I need help making items spawn on the ground and when a player picks it up it respawns in like 30 seconds any helps me they get some Rep++ :p

item.title: [PI] Spawning items on the ground
item.dc:creator: @tehsandbox tehsandbox
item.description:
@tehsandbox wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:2, topic:395334”]umm make a cfg file i guess and add its codes

grounditem.cfg

copy the autospawns real codes (not cfg codes) and change them to items.

aka search autospawn copy it and paste it below and change to modify items.

like it has the basic setup for you search autospawn in client.java and find it then change monsterid to itemid and so on[/quote]
nice help man rep++

Read full topic
